recipe.title: Date Relish
ingredients: 2/3 cup chopped pitted Deglet Noor dates
2 teaspoons (about) minced seeded deveined habanero chile (from 1 chile)
instructions: Combine all ingredients except habanero chile in medium bowl; toss to blend. Add chile to taste. Season relish to taste with salt. DO AHEAD: Can be made 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature.
